notes.title: Technical Requirements
notes.content: Sarah mentioned they need React-based solution with real-time updates. They're currently using legacy system that needs modernization.
notes.author: John Smith

notes.title: Budget Discussion
notes.content: Budget range is $50K-$75K for initial implementation. Phase 2 expansion planned for Q2 2026.
notes.author: Jane Doe

notes.title: Team Introduction
notes.content: Sarah will introduce us to their CTO next week. Good opportunity to understand technical architecture and constraints.
